name: Japanese Language Basics
description: Courses covering the foundational aspects of the Japanese language, including hiragana, katakana, and basic grammar.

name: Intermediate Japanese
description: Courses aimed at enhancing conversational skills, kanji comprehension, and complex grammar.

name: Advanced Japanese
description: Courses designed for advanced learners focusing on fluency, professional language use, and advanced kanji.

name: Japanese Culture
description: Courses exploring the rich cultural heritage of Japan, including history, traditions, and modern influences.

name: JLPT Preparation
description: Courses specifically designed to help learners prepare for the Japanese Language Proficiency Test at various levels.

name: Japanese for Travel
description: Short courses focused on essential Japanese phrases and customs for travelers.
